actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend section 8(b) of the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act, as amended, to reinstitute certain permanent soil- and water-conserving practices under such act.

summary.text: Reinstitutes specified permanent soil and water-conservation practices under the soil conservation and Domestic Allotment Act. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 590h)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8(b) of the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act, as amended, to reinstitute certain permanent soil- and water-conserving practices under such act.
